title: 12/08/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/08/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Washington Football Team victory over the now one loss Steelers. Is Washington a true contender in the NFC East? We're joined by Pro Football Focus Senior Analyst Steve Palazzolo, Alabama QB Mac Jones and Michigan Football Beat Writer for the Ann Arbor News, Aaron McMann. Plus, DP reflects on the passing of John Lennon 40 years ago today.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
